programme.title: Disobedience
programme.desc: Photographer Ronit Krushka returns to the London community that shunned her decades earlier for her childhood attraction to a female friend. Their happy reunion soon reignites their burning passion as they explore boundaries of faith and sexuality.

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: The Sympathizer
programme.desc: A communist party mole, the captain juggles the demands of his South Vietnam Army boss, the general, and his CIA handler, Claude; with the fall of Saigon imminent, the captain must round up a list of evacuees for a flight to the U.S.

programme.title: The Sympathizer
programme.desc: The Captain and his fellow Vietnamese refugees attempt to settle into life in Los Angeles; the defeated General grows suspicious and demands the Captain locate a mole he believes has infiltrated their ranks.

programme.title: The Sympathizer
programme.desc: With the General's order to eliminate the spy in their ranks weighing on him, the Captain seeks Bon's help to craft and execute a plan timed for Independence Day; at an upscale lunch, Claude introduces the Captain to the Auteur.

programme.title: The Sympathizer
programme.desc: The Captain, a North Vietnamese spy, navigates the challenges of living a double life as he begins to symphatize with a community of South Vietnamese refugees in the US.

programme.title: The Sympathizer
programme.desc: After a lengthy hospital stay, the Captain finds his life in disarray; Lana is working a new gig away from her parents; Ms. Mori is romantically involved with a familiar face; the General has concocted a plan to reclaim his homeland.

programme.title: The Sympathizer
programme.desc: Convinced that the General's plan is doomed to fail, the captain's mission is to trace the General's funding, his desperation grows as he searches for ways to expose the military operation and to achieve his ultimate goal, to save Bon.

programme.title: The Sympathizer
programme.desc: Before sending them into Vietnam, Claude treats the squad to a night out in Thailand and reveals some terrifying intelligence to the Captain; the Captain finds himself in a reeducation camp, forced to confront the decisions that haunt his past.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Walter Keane (Christoph Waltz) achieves worldwide fame for pop-art portraits of saucer-eyed waifs, but no one knows that it's his wife, Margaret (Amy Adams), who's the real genius behind the paintbrush.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Seven years have passed since Dr. Hannibal Lecter (Anthony Hopkins) escaped from custody. The doctor is now at large in Europe. Mason Verger (Gary Oldman) remembers Lecter too, and is obsessed with revenge.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Batman and his new ally Wonder Woman recruit Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash to help them save the planet from a newly awakened enemy.

programme.title: Steve Jobs: The Man in the Machine
programme.desc: Filmmaker Alex Gibney examines the life and legacy of the Apple co-founder, a man of intense personal drive whose passing led to an unprecedented outpouring of grief across the globe.

programme.desc: Members (Emjay Anthony, Adam Scott, Toni Collette) of a dysfunctional family face the wrath of Krampus, an ancient demon from European folklore who punishes naughty children at Christmastime.

programme.desc: A paranormal investigator must confront a terrorizing dark entity that is haunting a beloved neighbor's home.

programme.title: Camp Hell
programme.desc: Horrific events plague a teen when his parents send him to a Christian camp.

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs

programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren keep a possessed doll locked up in an artifacts room in their house. When the doll awakens the room's evil spirits, it soon becomes a night of terror for the couple's young daughter and her friends.

programme.title: The Batman
programme.desc: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues. As the scale of the perpetrator's plans become clear, he must bring justice to the abuse of power and corruption that plagues the metropolis.

programme.desc: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

programme.title: Friday
programme.desc: A South Central Los Angeles resident (Ice Cube) hangs out on his front porch with a pal (Chris Tucker) who owes money to a drug dealer.

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: To avoid being beaten up, a young man (Ice Cube) goes to live with his uncle, who just won the lottery.

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Working as security guards, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

programme.title: Goodrich
programme.desc: Andy's life gets upended when his wife enters a 90-day rehab program, leaving him in charge of their twins. With his career falling by the wayside, he soon leans on his pregnant daughter for support, ultimately becoming the father she never had.

programme.title: Elevation
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic survivors find refuge in the Rocky Mountains to hide from giant, insect-like creatures that can't live above 8,000 feet. However, when one of them needs life-saving supplies, they risk it all to venture into the danger zone.
